title: Removing a working set immediately causes package view to refilter
description: When removing a working set, the package view is immediately refiltered in the background. The expected behavior is that the refiltering should only occur when closing the working set selection dialog, not during the manipulation of the working set. Additionally, pressing cancel should cancel all changes made to the working sets, including canceling the removal of a working set.
OB: 1. Create a working set with one project and select it. 2. Observe that the package view is filtered.
EB: At the moment of deletion, the package view should not immediately refilter. Refiltering should only happen when closing the working set selection dialog. Canceling the removal action should also cancel any changes made to the working sets.
SR: 1. Create a working set with one project and select it. 2. Attempt to remove the working set. 3. Observe that the package view is immediately refiltered. 4. Cancel the removal action. 5. Verify that all changes made to the working sets are canceled.
